content.prompt: The purpose of the photograph depicting the welcoming processional for Queen Elizabeth II is to

choices.label: record a ritual celebrating renewed trade agreements
allow the international press access to secret religious ceremonies
show the establishment of the first democratic elections
document a complex and prescribed cultural exchange

topic.text: 9.2: Interactions Within and Across Cultures in Pacific Art

skill.text: Skill 2.B: Explain how the possible intent, purpose, and/or function shape the creation or meaning of a work of art (or group of related works of art).
